cab.content: S S C R E I,BATTLE SITUATION - NOON - 8th JULY, 1918,WESTERN FRONT,Last night Australian troops carried out a further small advance on a front of 3000 yards, astride the SOME, capturing a few prisoners. Otherwise the general situation Is unchanged.ITALIAN FRONT,The situation is unchanged.General SiFor the personal information -of the Minister only.War Office, S.W.1. 8th July, 1918.Issued at 12.25 p,m.
